text:
Hello, everyone again!
I hope all you had a wonderful weekend!

Now, I am going to get the notes from Hubpost, I mean, notes of contacts and companies, etc.
But, I couldn't find the property name for notes, I tried to several times, but they didnt return the notes as a response. As you can see in the images, there are three notes in `<mailto:aaaaa@aaaa.com|aaaaa@aaaa.com>` account, but I failed to get the notes from HubSpot through api.
I would really appreciate it if someone could help me.

P.S. <@U06KP87QUJW> Could you help me again this time? :grin:
